name: Tongue Tied (Audrey Scharrer, OzTheMechanical, Andaroo)
description:
You’re tongue tied (literally), stuck at the bottom of a well, and your only hope of escape is to work with a big hungry frog. How are you going to get out of this one? The answer: Throw your pet Gerbil, Jerry, and use him as bait for the frog! Don’t worry, Jerry will be fine. Work your way up the well with your slimy, green partner, and maybe even have a new friend at the end of your journey! It’s a story of heart, humor, and platforming! Play now and experience the adventure!

Controls: - Move with WASD or Arrow Keys - Hold left mouse button to aim, release to throw - Right click to get the frog to fetch - Ctrl+R: Restart Level - Ctrl+F: Toggle Fullscreen

Team: 

Nigel Randall - Game Designer/Programmer - https://ozthemechanical.itch.io/

Brady Muth - Composer/Sound Designer - https://bradymuthaudio.com/

Andrew Han - Programmer - https://andaroo.itch.io/

Audrey Scharrer - Lead Artist https://audreyscharrer.com
